## XForm.reparent() method

Removes this node from it's parent and add this node to another parent node if required

**Signature:**

```typescript
reparent(p?: T): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | T | _(Optional)_ The new parent node that this node should be added to or null |

**Returns:**

this

self
